    public class CoverageReportFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Main display for the results of the code coverage.
    Author:
    Ian

    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(java.util.List<BCoveragePackage> classesCovered,
          java.awt.Frame location)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a coverage frame for the provided coverage information.

        If a coverage frame already exists, resets it show the new coverage information.

        Parameters:
        classesCovered - coverage information to display
        location - location and size for the coverage frame if this is the first time opening it
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createNewFrame

        private void createNewFrame(java.util.List<BCoveragePackage> classesCovered,
                  java.awt.Frame fr)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new coverage frame.
        Parameters:
        classesCovered - coverage information to show
        fr - frame location and size
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        create(List, Frame)

      • reset

        private void reset(java.util.List<BCoveragePackage> newInfo)
        Resets the frame to show the new coverage information.
        Parameters:
        newInfo - new information to show.

      • generateTabs

        private void generateTabs()
        Sets up the divider location, and adds the overview and source display to the frame.

      • bringUpTab

        private void bringUpTab(BCoverageClass clz)
        Brings up the source code when a node is clicked on the overview panel.
        Parameters:
        clz - selected class.

      • moveCaret

        private void moveCaret(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode node,
             javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode parent)
        Moves the caret on the source code display when an element is selected in the overview panel.

        An example is when a method is selected on the overview panel, it moves the viewport of the source code to that method.

        Parameters:
        node - selected element on the overview panel
        parent - parent node to open if the source is not current open.
